text: A covered voter may use a federal write-in absentee ballot to vote for all offices and ballot measures in an election described in § 1-1061.03.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-137, see notes under § 1-1061.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 11 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 1-1061.11

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Accommodations for Military and Overseas Voters.
